Audio.Locality: trail between Hotel Donati and Hotel Simon, Itatiaia NP, RJ
Audio.Author: Herman van Oosten
Audio.Comments: Wowow! Great to see them. Scattered flock or sevaral small flocks of about 10-20 birds feeding on seeding bamboo. Only very few concerned full adult plumaged males. Bird seen on several occasions in Itatiaia NP, sometimes just 1-2 feeding sielently on bambooseeds in forest. Often accompagnied by Uniform Finches
